Vertices are what connect lines together in a map. Every wall is made up of two vertices. A vertex can be accessed from a [[Structs:Line|line]] via its '''v1''' and '''v2''' pointers. It can also be accessed from [[Structs:Side|sides]] via their '''V1'''() and '''V2'''() methods. Lastly, [[Structs:LevelLocals|level]] contains an array of all vertices in the map via its '''Vertexes''' array. A line's '''v1''' vertex is always the vertex on the right relative to the direction the line is facing.
==Fields== *''readonly'' Vector2 '''p''' - The xy coordinate of the vertex in the map.
==Methods== ===Non-static=== *int '''Index'''()
